official_title: A bill to provide reduced rates for nonprofit senior citizens organizations.

summary.text: Entitles a qualified nonprofit senior citizen organization to the reduced third-class postal rates in effect for other qualified nonprofit organizations.

titles.title: A bill to provide reduced rates for nonprofit senior citizens organizations.
